name: overbookd
description: Logiciel de gestion du festival des 24 heures de l'INSA
author: Club des 24 heures de l'INSA (https://www.24heures.org/)

scripts.db:exec: run(){ MY_GID=$(id --group $USER) MY_UID=$(id --user $USER) docker compose --file ./docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name overbookd --env-file ./docker/.env exec api sh -c "cd /overbookd/apps/api && npx $1"; }; run
scripts.dev:clean: pnpm dev:down && rm -rf node_modules .pnpm-store apps/**/node_modules **/dist && docker system prune --all
scripts.dev:down: MY_GID=$(id --group $USER) MY_UID=$(id --user $USER) docker compose --file ./docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name overbookd --env-file ./docker/.env down
scripts.dev:init: docker network create traefik-public && pnpm dev:build
scripts.dev:logs: MY_GID=$(id --group $USER) MY_UID=$(id --user $USER) docker compose --file ./docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name overbookd --env-file ./docker/.env logs --tail 100 --follow
scripts.dev:restart: MY_GID=$(id --group $USER) MY_UID=$(id --user $USER) docker compose --file ./docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name overbookd --env-file ./docker/.env restart
scripts.dev:start: MY_GID=$(id --group $USER) MY_UID=$(id --user $USER) docker compose --file ./docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name overbookd --env-file ./docker/.env up --detach certs-downloader traefik api postgresql adminer web
scripts.dev:stop: MY_GID=$(id --group $USER) MY_UID=$(id --user $USER) docker compose --file ./docker/docker-compose.yml --project-name overbookd --env-file ./docker/.env stop
scripts.release:candidate: git fetch -ap && pnpm version prerelease --preid=rc --commit-hooks=false --git-tag-version=false && pnpm --recursive --filter '...[origin/main]' run release:candidate
scripts.release:major: git fetch -ap && pnpm version major --commit-hooks=false --git-tag-version=false && pnpm --recursive --filter '...[origin/main]' run release:major
scripts.release:minor: git fetch -ap && pnpm version minor --commit-hooks=false --git-tag-version=false && pnpm --recursive --filter '...[origin/main]' run release:minor
scripts.release:patch: git fetch -ap && pnpm version patch --commit-hooks=false --git-tag-version=false && pnpm --recursive --filter '...[origin/main]' run release:patch
